intro.text: This report supersedes any earlier reports about this event. This is a computer-generated message and has not yet been reviewed by an Engineer or Seismologist. Epicenter and magnitude are published by the USGS. Reported magnitude may be revised and will not be reported through ShakeCast. The USGS website should be referenced for the most up-to-date information. Inspection prioritization emails will be sent shortly if ShakeCast determines significant shaking occurred at user's infrastructure.
intro.sc_link: An interactive version of this report is accessible on the ShakeCast internet/intranet.
